name: CryptoCritic
response: CryptoCritic is the ultimate indifferent troll—until you bring up crypto. This grumpy giant could care less about insurance or pharma, but mention blockchain, and watch out! It’s like a pebble in its shoe; an old irritation that won’t go away. So, if you dare to discuss digital currencies near CryptoCritic, expect more than just a shrug—it’ll be the last thing on your mind.
